title: WTB: T3 "Trying To Catch Him Napping"

posts.post_title: WTB: T3 "Trying To Catch Him Napping"
posts.post_content: Looking for a lower grade version of this one...preferable PSA but would consider raw, too.  I can't go any higher than $175 so it will be interesting to see what (if anything) that will get me!  Thanks in advance...M@tt
